newsitem.title: USA: Cel-Sci cuts exercise price for warrants.
newsitem.headline: Cel-Sci cuts exercise price for warrants.

text.p: Immunotherapy company Cel-Sci Corp said on Thursday that the exercise price of its publicly held warrants would be lowered from $15.00 to $6.00, effective June 1.
In addition, the company said it had improved the terms of conversion of the warrants so that only five warrants are required to purchase one share.
Previously 10 warrants had been required, the company said. The change will also be effective June 1, it added.
Cel-Sci Corp develops a cancer therapy as well as vaccines against a number of infectious diseases.
